Cursed Run.NAME: Cursed Run
Cursed Run.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you defeat a Boss, become Cursed.

Elite Swarm.NAME: Elite Swarm
Elite Swarm.DESCRIPTION: Elite enemies are swarming the Spire.

Night Terrors.NAME: Night Terrors
Night Terrors.DESCRIPTION: Resting at campfires heal 20% of your HP, rather than 30%.

Diverse.NAME: Diverse
Diverse.DESCRIPTION: Start with 2 cards from another class.

Vintage.NAME: Vintage
Vintage.DESCRIPTION: The Merchant's prices are increased by 25%.

Midas.NAME: Midas
Midas.DESCRIPTION: Enemies drop 200% more gold, but you cannot upgrade cards at Rest Sites.

Insanity.NAME: Insanity
Insanity.DESCRIPTION: Start with a random deck of 50 cards.

Lethality.NAME: Lethality
Lethality.DESCRIPTION: You start each combat with +3 Strength. All enemies start combat with +3 Strength.

Terminal.NAME: Terminal
Terminal.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter a new room, lose 1 Max HP. Start each combat with 5 Plated Armor.

Hoarder.NAME: Hoarder
Hoarder.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you add a card to your deck, add two additional copies. You can no longer remove cards from your deck at the Merchant.
